subject: Science
title: Mutations: The Raw Material
description: Learn Mutations: The Raw Material in one minute.

hook.text: Every time DNA copies itself, it makes mistakes. Those mistakes drive all of evolution.

buildup.text: Most mutations are harmless or harmful. But occasionally, one is beneficial.

discovery.text: A single mutation can change a protein's shape, giving an organism a new ability.

twist.text: Without mutations, there would be no variation â€” and without variation, no evolution.

climax.text: Your DNA has about 60 new mutations that neither of your parents had.

punchline.text: You are a mutant. So is everyone. Mutations are evolution's lottery tickets.

quiz.question: Why are mutations essential for evolution?
options: They create the variation that natural selection acts on
They allow organisms to choose their traits
